title: Is Mr Perfect's 'rap is crap' song racist? Or is enjoying it racist? - Quora

response.answer_text: I forgot about that silly song. It was dreadful and if a person truly thought rap was crap then it is not racist. There are rap artists from many cultures and races. If anything was racist it was Ted Dibiase as a rich white guy having a black guy as a bodyguard or Ted kicking that basketball away from a young black kid….haha
